Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The antiarrhythmic activity of the compound N - ( trans - 3 - hydroxy - 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 - tetrahydro - 2 - naphthyl ) - N - ( 3 - oxo - 3 - phenyl - 2 - methylpropyl ) - piperazine hydrochloride , referred to as P11 , is studied on anaesthesized cats and Wistar albino rats , as well as on non - anaesthesized rabbits .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Anaesthesized cats |
| Wistar albino rats |
| Non-anaesthesized rabbits |

| Disease |
| --- |
| Anaesthesia in cats |
| Wistar albino rats (as a subject of study, not a disease) |
| Rabbits (not specified if anaesthetized or not) |

Note: Anaesthesia is considered a medical condition or state, not a disease, but it is included here as it is the condition under which the studies were conducted.
